Name: City Air Battle
About the game: City Air Battle is an arcade style flight shooting game. In the game, you can not only fly all kinds of stunts between skyscrapers, but also compete and fight fiercely with your opponents, and constantly challenge your flight and shooting skills in fast-paced and high-intensity confrontation. There are 3 cities in the game, all of which are based on the modeling of large cities in reality. All buildings and streets are the same as those of real cities. Each level has a score ranking list, which allows players to compete with netizens all over the world and encourages players to constantly break through the score limit.
